name: Human (Judah LearningMachine)
description:
A game not for entertainment; But for experiencing art and discovering yourself

Entertainment is what makes a game, but this game is not for entertainment; it transcends that into a new form of art and experience, exploring and questioning our own convictions in philosophy, religion, politics, and even our own consciousness.

This game will appeal to people who are interested in both human and natural sciences alike.

Questioning philosophy in duality, idealism, realism, Empiricism and rationalism.

Questioning religion in atheism, theism, monotheism and polytheism.

Questioning politics in liberalism and hierarchical structures.

and also questioning our own consciousness.

This game may not be perfect in terms of arguments or gameplay, it is just a try to transform gaming from entertainment into art.

The game's storyline is about 40 minutes long and 20MB.

Enjoy the experience.

If you liked the idea. please consider donating, allowing us to bring more ideas to the gaming world.
